## Rain1155.(constructor)

Constructs a new Rain1155 from a known address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(signer: Signer, address?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signer | Signer | An ethers.js Signer |
|  address | string | <i>(Optional)</i> (optional) The address of the Rain1155 contract, originally is fetched from the addressbook, but if passed it will ignore the addressbook |
